Package org.drip.xva.set

Collateral, Counter Party, Netting Groups

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollateralGroupSpecification
    CollateralGroupSpecification contains the Specifications of a Collateral Group.
    CounterPartyGroupSpecification
    CounterPartyGroupSpecification contains the Specifications of a Counter Party Group.
    GroupSpecificationContainer
    GroupSpecificationContainer holds the Named Group Specifications.
    NettingGroupSpecification
    NettingGroupSpecification contains the Specification of a Netting Group.
    PositionGroupSpecification
    PositionGroupSpecification contains the Specifications of a Position Group.
    PositionGroupSpecificationContainer
    PositionGroupSpecificationContainer contains the Specifications of a Position Group.
    RollUpGroupSpecification
    RollUpGroupSpecification contains the Specifications of a Roll Up Group.

Package org.drip.xva.set Description
